ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1937
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jaegir is on another mission in the latest edition of 2000 AD – out on Wednesday from all good Thrill-merchants! In this week’s edition of the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic: Judge Dredd: Blood of Emeralds by Michael Carroll, Colin MacNeil, Chris Blythe and Annie Parkhouse; Absalom: Under A False Flag by Gordon Rennie, Tiernan Trevallion, and Simon Bowland; the conclusion of Sláine: The Brutania Chronicles – Primordial by Pat Mills, Simon Davis, and Ellie De Ville; Helium by Ian Edginton, D’Israeli, and Ellie De Ville, plus the brand new series of Outlier by TC Eglington, Karl Richardson and Annie Parkhouse.
Cover: Paul Marshall
Judge Dredd - Blood of Emeralds (Part Four) (Michael Carroll - Colin Macneil)Absalom - Under A False Flag (Part Four) (Gordon Rennie - Tiernen Trevallion)Helium (Part Four) (Ian Edginton - D'Israeli)Outlier - Dark Symmetries (Part Three) (T C Eglington - Karl Richardson)Jaegir - Tartarus (Part One) (Gordon Rennie - Simon Coleby)Sláine: The Brutania Chronicles Book Two - Primordial (Part Fourteen) (Pat Mills - Simon Davis)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-24 16:17:37. [CVDB493859]

ComicInfo.Characters: Atalia Jaegir, Harry Absalom, Judge Dredd, Judge Joyce, Sláine
